387130.name: Zombie Hunter, Inc.
387130.description:
In Zombie Hunter, Inc., you play as a zombie hunter-for-hire who rescues stranded survivors -- for a reasonable fee, of course. If you die, you are given a choice of 3 new random survivors to assume control of, each with their strengths and weaknesses. The game features a unique "helicopter camera" that allows you to aim for the head for the first time in top-down shooters and adds a new dimension to world exploration.

KEY FEATURES:
* Top-down shooter with unique "helicopter camera" that allow players to aim for the head and adds a new dimension to world exploration
* Roguelike campaign mode where you are forced to constantly make decisions: abandon the current mission for a fee and save your survivor, or stay and risk dying. Try to come back for items of your previous character or abandon them to stay safe. Retreat to base before the night comes or stay to pick up loot and risk getting swarmed.
* Numerous guns and gadgets, each with its unique mechanics, that will help you dominate the zombies . . . if you are willing to learn how to use them!
